data.subject: What`s Love Got To Do With It
data.lyric:
You must understand
 Though the touch of your hand
 Makes my pulse react
 That it's only the thrill

data.subject: We Don`t Need Another Hero (Thunderdome)
data.lyric:
Out of the ruins
 Out from the wreckage
 Can't make the same mistake this time
 We are the children
